component.text:
Activity

Match each problem to the correct layer of the OSI model with which it is best associated.

Drag the layer to the problem.
Vida is unable to connect to a web server even though she is able to ping and tracert to the same address.
Carlos misconfigures an ACL to filter DNS traffic when he meant to filter FTP traffic.
Gustavo configures PPP encapsulation on one end of the serial link to the ISP and the link goes down.
Tyrone checks the MAC address table on the switch and notices that the value for one of the connected hosts is not correct.
Suresh mistypes the IP address on the router interface.
Rebecca installs the wrong type of antenna on the AP.
Please review the types of problems associated with each layer of the OSI model and try again.
You have successfully associated the problem with the correct layer. Click Next to continue.
